description: This file declares functions and includes headers related to device prioritization utilities, such as parameter name retrieval and event publishing, for a device management system.

methods.name: getParamName
methods.description: Returns the parameter name corresponding to the given device parameter path.

methods.name: getDevicePrioParamName
methods.description: Returns the device priority parameter name for a given devicePrioParam_t enum value.

methods.name: DevicePrio_PublishToEvent
methods.description: Publishes an event with the specified name, new data, old data, and data type.
